channel.title: Hi, I'm Derek Clark from 30 South
channel.description: I'm a software developer originally from Ohio but now living in Nashville, TN for the last 6 years. I quit my day job a little over 2 years ago to run a mobile app business and do a bit of freelancing. I've enjoyed making apps and it has gone well, but I'm currently looking to move into a B2B SaaS business. Something about having an ARPU greater than 70 cents is enticing :-)

item.title: Hi, I'm Derek Clark from 30 South
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Hi Derek. Great to have another mobile developer on here. Welcome to the forums!

Read full topic
item.source: Hi, I'm Derek Clark from 30 South
